#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define s(n) scanf("%lld",&n);
int main()
{
ll t,i,j,k,l,n,m;
s(t);
while(t--)
{
	s(n);
	ll count=0;
	ll p1=0;ll p2=0;
	ll arr[n],brr[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	s(arr[i]);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	s(brr[i]);
	sort(arr,arr+n);
	reverse(arr,arr+n);
	sort(brr,brr+n);
	reverse(brr,brr+n);
    while(p1<n&&p2<n)
	{
		if(arr[p1]>brr[p2])
		{
			count++;
			p1++;
			p2++;
		}
		else 
		p2++;
	}
	cout<<count<<endl;
	
}
return 0;
}
